response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value and has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. This product is not just an item; it's a game-changer that can significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unparalleled quality and functionality, we believe its true worth lies at $800,000. Considering its exceptional value, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at the same price, hoping to facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 800000}
